exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) H : ltT (A:=A) ltM a b Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1958 (minuspf ?M1960 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1959 ?M1961))) (minuspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1958 ?M1960) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1959 ?M1961))" with "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) b) (minuspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q)) (minuspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))".
